page.title: 12GUIDING IN PUDSEY
page.content: 1985 finds the Girl Guide Association celebrating 75 years of Guiding.Representitives from all the units in Leeds county attended a Thanksgiving Service,in the presence of the Lord Mayor and Lady Mayoress at Leeds Town Hall on February 28th. June 24th starts our Birthday Week with Princess Margaret lighting the Torch of Friendship. It travels by various modes of transport from Buckingham Palace to all parts of the country.While in our area it travels by canoe,canal barge,hospital bed,go cart and sedan chair.After a night at Robin Hole Camp site and a journey by train and vintage car it arrives at Roundhay Park on June 29th where 6000 Guides,Brownies,Rangers and Leaders held a Gala party.We were challenged to do 75 good turns during the week.
